name: LoL-Iris
body:
![Iris Logo](http://i.imgur.com/rvFDvpC.png)
# the LoL Communicator
[Download Beta .ZIP Here](https://github.com/RitoSaltworks/lol-iris/archive/master.zip)

## The radial-menu-driven, in-game-overlain, contextual, completely customizable ping enhancer and chat macro system, which utilizes live game data to help you communicate important information like which cooldowns are used by your enemy. It is named for the Greek goddess of comms (and rainbows)

An open source project from K pot's

![](http://i.imgur.com/a25sm40.png)![](http://i.imgur.com/UgprqaI.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
